document_data.name: Alec Carrathal III
document_data.mainbody: '''Alec III''' of the [[Carrathal Dynasty]] was a High King of [[Callidyrr]] in the early 11{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the [[Ffolk]] outside of Callidyrr.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the Carrathal royal family of Callidyrr and was the grandson of his predecessor, [[Erfle Carrathal|King Erfle]]. His son and sole heir was [[Bayle Carrathal|Bayle]], who would go on to be his successor. Bayle's eventual successor, [[Yolanda Carrathal|Yolanda]], was Alec III's grandniece.
document_data.History: Alex III assumed the throne in the {{YearlinkName|1012}}, after the death of King Erfle. He ruled for eighteen years before dying in a fire in the {{YearlinkName|1030}}.
